Text:
@ salazam
.mkv is a kick ass container for hd videos. VLC plays them just fine. I would rather DL an .mkv over an .avi anyday! If .mkv's are causing you to crash, try updating VLC. Thank you phatwarez for posting this in .mkv format. soon it will be the "normal" format. Thanks again phatwarez!
@bowhan333 ,  I am just agree with u man .. I ♥ .MKV format ....
MKV for life man. AVI needs additional files for subs or hardsubs....
